general.description:
Adam R.K. was a man that I had approached in 2019, with the desire to see his pack live through the ages of Immersive Vehicles. I knew very little of him, relying only on the information relayed to me by thou Don Bruce. In my history of knowing him, he was rather distant, and unclear on what he desired. He was, admittedly, vulgar in his requests for what to put into empty spaces. However he was a man who, against expectations, was willing to entrust me with the future of his pack.
It is because of this trust, that I, Laura M. Darkez, give to mts the ARK Peterbilt 379 Heavy Industrial Content Pack! Maintained and refurbished, my goal is to uphold the trust granted to me, and to let Adam R. K's legacy live on.
